name: Pongfinity Duels
description:
Become the king of table tennis with Pongfinity Duels!
Play quick online multiplayer 1v1 games against real players all around the world!

- Online real-time multiplayer ping pong matches
- Jump into public matches or play with your friends
- Simple controls; tap to move, swipe to shoot!
- Unlock players, rackets and more!
- Fun special shots; Fireball, Laser, Ice and many more!
- Compete on the global leaderboards
- Explore sports arenas; New York, Moscow, Tokyo and more!

Your first opponent is waiting, download Pongfinity Duels now and start your journey!

Links to Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below.

Privacy Policy: https://linnamaentertainment.com/privacy-pongfinityduels
